law.text:
In addition to any other penalty under this title, a public official or employee found by the Ethics Commission or a court to have violated this title:
may be removed or subjected to other disciplinary action; and
if subject to an order of the Commission or a court directing compliance, may not receive salary or other compensation pending full compliance with the order.
